item.title: Man's Search for Meaning - Book Review
item.description: What can you do during acute inhuman soul-crushing conditions in life? Hope. This book is about “Hope.” - dopamine for life. Psychiatrist Viktor Frankl’s presents his life in Nazi death camps and learning for spiritual survival. The narrative is based on his experience and the experiences of others he treated later in his practice. The author aptly reiterated throughout the book “We cannot avoid suffering, but we can choose how to cope with it, and find a meaning to live.
